channel.title: Splunk Synthetic Scripting :: Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: Proactively find and fix performance issues across user flows, business transactions and APIs to deliver better digital experiences.

item.title: 1. Real Browser Test
item.description: Introduction This workshop walks you through using the Chrome DevTools Recorder to create a synthetic transaction against a Splunk demonstration instance. The exported JSON from the Chrome DevTools Recorder will then be used to create a Splunk Synthetic Monitoring Real Browser Test. In addition, you will also get to learn other Splunk Synthetic Monitoring checks like API Test and Uptime Test. Pre-requisites Google Chrome Browser installed Access to Splunk Observability Cloud

item.title: API Test
